content: This is a very nice reading list. Technology is becoming more intertwined in our lives and is becoming essential to understand in order to make it in today’s world. Here is my reading list. Many of the books aren’t related to technology but they were really great reads and many of the biographies of comedians and presidents were influenced by my work on the campaign trail as well as my side hobby of stand up comedy. https://medium.com/@chris.j.waldeck/the-books-that-i-read-in-2016-dca46cf1b95d#.ht3fuhdjh
